name: japanese-real-estate-scraper
description: A comprehensive web application for scraping and translating Japanese real estate listings

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:shared
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && serve -s build
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:shared
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:shared
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:up postgres redis && sleep 5 && npm run migrate:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/build frontend/node_modules shared/dist shared/node_modules node_modules
